author: Richard Galant, CNN
title: Donald Trump's special day
description: The President talked of reopening the country by Easter, which he called a "very special day." But public health officials stressed that America was in for a longer period of enforced isolation, saying the April 12 target was "aspirational."
content:
Sign up to get our new weekly column as a newsletter. We're looking back at the strongest, smartest opinion takes of the week from CNN and other outlets.
